meanings.definition: The act of aligning or the state of being aligned.
meanings.sent1: The alinement of the books on the shelf was perfect.
meanings.sent2: She checked the alinement of the picture frames on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The alinement of the ducks in a row made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The alinement of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The alinement of the planets could be seen clearly through the telescope.

meanings.definition: The proper positioning or arrangement in relation to something else.
meanings.sent1: The alinement of the chairs around the table was neat.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the alinement of the wheels on his bike.
meanings.sent3: The alinement of the toys on the floor looked like a pattern.
meanings.sent4: The alinement of colors in the painting was striking.
meanings.sent5: The alinement of the trees along the path created a beautiful scene.
